name: RandomActivityPicker
0:
”Alexa pick a random activity”
”Alexa pick random activity”
”Alexa pick activity”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: pick a random activity
des:
Picks a random activity.

Random Activity Picker randomly picks an activity for the family to enjoy together.

To start, just say "Alexa, pick a random activity"

At anytime, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
